009package Hough_Transform;
010
011import java.awt.Color;
012import java.util.Arrays;
013
014import ij.IJ;
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
017import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
018import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
019import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
020import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
021import imagingbook.lib.ij.IjUtils;
022import imagingbook.pub.hough.HoughTransformLines;
023import imagingbook.pub.hough.lines.HoughLine;
024import imagingbook.pub.hough.lines.HoughLineOverlay;
025
026/** 
027 * This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the {@link HoughTransformLines}
028 * class for detecting straight lines in images.
029 * It expects an input image with background = 0 and foreground (contour) 
030 * pixels with values &gt; 0.
031 * A vector overlay is used to display the detected lines.
032 * 
033 * @author W. Burger
034 * @version 2020/12/13
035 */
036public class Find_Straight_Lines implements PlugInFilter {
037
038        static int MaxLines = 5;                        // number of strongest lines to be found
039        static int MinPointsOnLine = 50;        // min. number of points on each line
040
041        static boolean ShowAccumulator = true;
042        static boolean ShowExtendedAccumulator = false;
043        static boolean ShowAccumulatorPeaks = false;
044        static boolean ListStrongestLines = false;
045        static boolean ShowLines = true;
046        static boolean InvertOriginal = true;
047        
048        static double  LineWidth = 0.5;
049        static Color   LineColor = Color.magenta;
050        
051        static boolean ShowReferencePoint = true;
052        static Color   ReferencePointColor = Color.green;
053
054        ImagePlus imp;  
055
056        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
057                this.imp = imp;
058                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
059        }
060
061        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
062                
063                if (!IjUtils.isBinary(ip)) {
064                        IJ.showMessage("Binary (edge) image required!");
065                        return;
066                }
067
068                HoughTransformLines.Parameters params = new HoughTransformLines.Parameters();
069
070                if (!showDialog(params)) //dialog canceled or error
071                        return; 
072
073                // compute the Hough Transform and retrieve the strongest lines:
074                HoughTransformLines ht = new HoughTransformLines(ip, params);
075                HoughLine[] lines = ht.getLines(MinPointsOnLine, MaxLines);
076
077                if (lines.length == 0) {
078                        IJ.log("No lines detected - check the input image and parameters!");
079                }
080
081                if (ShowAccumulator){
082                        FloatProcessor accIp = ht.getAccumulatorImage();
083                        (new ImagePlus("HT of " + imp.getTitle(), accIp)).show();
084                }
085
086                if (ShowExtendedAccumulator){
087                        FloatProcessor accEx = ht.getAccumulatorImageExtended();
088                        (new ImagePlus("accumExt of " + imp.getTitle(), accEx)).show();
089                }
090
091                if (ShowAccumulatorPeaks) {
092                        FloatProcessor maxIp = ht.getAccumulatorMaxImage();
093                        (new ImagePlus("Maxima of " + imp.getTitle(), maxIp)).show();
094                }
095
096                if (ListStrongestLines) {
097                        for (int i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
098                                IJ.log(i + ": " + lines[i].toString());
099                        }
100                }
101                
102                if (ShowLines) {
103                        ColorProcessor lineIp = ip.convertToColorProcessor();
104                        if (InvertOriginal) lineIp.invert();
105
106                        HoughLineOverlay oly = new HoughLineOverlay(ip.getWidth(), ip.getHeight());
107                        oly.strokeColor(LineColor);
108                        oly.strokeWidth(LineWidth);
109                        oly.addItems(Arrays.asList(lines));
110
111                        if (ShowReferencePoint) {
112                                oly.strokeColor(ReferencePointColor);
113                                oly.strokeWidth(1.0);
114                                oly.markPoint(ht.getXref(), ht.getYref(), ReferencePointColor);
115                        }
116
117                        ImagePlus him = new ImagePlus(imp.getShortTitle()+"-lines", lineIp);
118                        him.setOverlay(oly);
119                        him.show();
120                }
121        }
122
123        // -----------------------------------------------------------------
124
125        private boolean showDialog(HoughTransformLines.Parameters params) {
126                // display dialog , return false if canceled or on error.
127                GenericDialog dlg = new GenericDialog("Hough Transform (lines)");
128                dlg.addNumericField("Axial steps", params.nAng, 0);
129                dlg.addNumericField("Radial steps", params.nRad, 0);
130                dlg.addNumericField("Max. number of lines to show", MaxLines, 0);
131                dlg.addNumericField("Min. number of points per line", MinPointsOnLine, 0);
132                dlg.addCheckbox("Show accumulator", ShowAccumulator);
133                dlg.addCheckbox("Show extended accumulator", ShowExtendedAccumulator);
134                dlg.addCheckbox("Show accumulator peaks", ShowAccumulatorPeaks);
135                dlg.addCheckbox("List strongest lines", ListStrongestLines);
136                dlg.addCheckbox("Show lines", ShowLines);
137                dlg.addNumericField("Line width", LineWidth, 1);
138                dlg.addCheckbox("Show reference point", ShowReferencePoint);
139                dlg.showDialog();
140                if(dlg.wasCanceled())
141                        return false;
142                params.nAng = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
143                params.nRad = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
144                MaxLines = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
145                MinPointsOnLine = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
146                ShowAccumulator = dlg.getNextBoolean();
147                ShowExtendedAccumulator = dlg.getNextBoolean();
148                ShowAccumulatorPeaks = dlg.getNextBoolean();
149                ListStrongestLines = dlg.getNextBoolean();
150                ShowLines = dlg.getNextBoolean();
151                LineWidth = dlg.getNextNumber();
152                ShowReferencePoint = dlg.getNextBoolean();
153                if(dlg.invalidNumber()) {
154                        IJ.showMessage("Error", "Invalid input number");
155                        return false;
156                }
157                return true;
158        }
159
160}
